EventCounter

This component is used to count events and present the count at the data output [Out]. The count is reset when the event input [In]rst fires. Note that the counter has an upper limit of 2147483647. When the count exceeds this value the count will start again at 0.

Ports

  • [In] :

    Input event, an event to be counted.

  • [In] rst:

    Input event, resets the count to zero.

  • [Out] :

    Data output, the current count presented when an input event is triggered.

  • [Out] :

    Output event.

Parameters

None.

State Machine

Stateless.

Profiles

All.

Toolbox

Core.

Version

v2.1.

Native Dependencies

  • TDK1.1:

Licence Type

LGPL.

Component Supplier

inx ltd.
